message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering its true value is worth $10,000 to you. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to offer $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $9,000. I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great compromise, considering the product's true value to you is $10,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. This would be a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, and I'm willing to make another compromise. However, I'm not willing to go down to $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, and sell the product to you for $10,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's true value to me is $10,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
